submitTool.question: How do I submit a new tool?
submitTool.answer: You can submit a new tool by clicking the "Submit" button in the navigation menu. Fill out the required information about the tool, including its name, description, and URL. Our team will review your submission and add it to the platform if it meets our criteria.

toolCategories.question: How are tools categorized?
toolCategories.answer: Tools are categorized based on their primary function and target audience. We use a combination of automated classification and manual review to ensure accurate categorization. If you find a tool in the wrong category, please let us know.

suggestions.question: Can I suggest improvements to the platform?
suggestions.answer: Absolutely! We welcome feedback and suggestions from our users. You can submit your ideas through the contact form or by reaching out to us directly. We regularly review user feedback to improve the platform.

updates.question: How often is the tool database updated?
updates.answer: Our tool database is updated daily. New tools are added as they are submitted and approved, and existing entries are regularly reviewed for accuracy and relevance.

customCampaign.question: How do I create a custom campaign?
customCampaign.answer: Create a custom marketing campaign to promote your tool or service. We'll provide professional marketing support to help you reach your target audience.

sponsor.question: How can I sponsor the platform?
sponsor.answer: Sponsor our platform and reach our growing community of AI enthusiasts. We offer various sponsorship packages to meet your marketing needs.
